paragraph: to call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: With over 30 years of experience, the lawyers at Keller Grover are leaders in their field.

detailsData.title: Track Record of Success
detailsData.content: Having recovered billions for clients, Keller Grover has a winning track record in litigating fraud and employment cases.

detailsData.title: Unique Expertise
detailsData.content: Specializing in representing employees, consumers, and whistleblowers, Keller Grover offers comprehensive legal services.

valueProp: Keller Grover is a leading law firm specializing in protecting the rights of employees, consumers, and whistleblowers. With a strong track record of success, we are dedicated to providing aggressive and effective representation for our clients.

testimonalData.text: The lawyers at Keller Grover provided me with the support I needed to pursue this case. Before I met them I felt frustrated, stressed, angry, and defeated. They worked tirelessly to expose the fraud and help me understand my rights. I'm glad I have Keller Grover on my side.
testimonalData.author: Current Whistleblower client

testimonalData.text: Keller Grover's team was exceptional in handling my employment violation case. They fought for my rights and ensured I received fair compensation. I highly recommend their services to anyone facing similar issues.
testimonalData.author: Satisfied Client

testimonalData.text: I was a victim of unlawful business practices and Keller Grover stood by me throughout the legal process. Their dedication and expertise led to a successful resolution of my case. Thank you, Keller Grover!
testimonalData.author: Consumer Protection Client
